Elita:

=E2=80=9CIf my dad needs me then I have to go where he is=E2=80=9Ds=
aid Elita while tears continued falling


From: Sandy Panico 
Sent: Sunday,=
 August 14, 2011 10:39 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Strange =
meetings - new friends & old enemies




Straight Shot puts an arm around E=
lita.

" don't you worry, if Uncle Tucson could save him before, he can do =
it again.  And so can we.  He taught us how to look inside our inner warrio=
r and find strength, tenacity, courage and determination.  But he also taug=
ht us that we can overcome any obstacle if we put our minds to it.  You see=
m very determined ta go out there with us and ya know what? That's what you=
r dad needs more than anything else.  He needs us but he REALLY needs you. =
 So let's do this together, all three of us.  Let's show whoever has your d=
ad that we mean business."

Nightshift flashes his highbeams.

" I second t=
hat, look out world 'cause here we come!"


Perpetually on the move and con=
stantly busy. 

On Aug 14, 2011, at 8:30 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002=
@...> wrote:


    
  Hydras/Elita:

  Hydras hissed annoyed and st=
arted to scan for Cyclonus's signature.

  ******************

  Elita star=
ted to sob and said "Mom was so happy to see him... she would be 
  hearthb=
roken when she knows what had happened"

  -----Mensaje original----- 
  Fr=
om: Sandy
  Sent: Sunday, August 14, 2011 7:11 PM
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com
  Subject: Re: Strange meetings - new friends & old enemies

  Straight=
 Shot makes the jump from the fallen trees, over to Nightshift, 
  landing =
on his roof on two feet. Elita needed extra protection now and 
  Nightshif=
t was forced to remain in alt form, seeing that it was the safest 
  thing =
for her. She looks to Scourge quickly and points in the direction of 
  Tuc=
son's heading.

  " SCOURGE, SEND A GROUP OF SWEEPS BEHIND TUCSON! HE MIGHT=
 GET AMBUSHED 
  HIMSELF! WE GOT ELITA SECURRED!"

  Nightshift puts his wi=
ndow down to allow Straight Shot inside in the 
  passengers seat.

  " You=
r dad isn't himself and we don't know why. But we'll do our best to 
  save=
 him.... Again."

  Nightshift comments.

  " Slag he better invest in some=
 serious anti hack'n software after this 
  time."

  Meanwhile Tucson cont=
inues the flight and scans the ground.

  " Noctorro, are we getting close =
to the Fuzors location?"

  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Super Cyclonus <=
supercyclonus@...> wrote:

hidden to

rk Rodimus was enough

  > > dim her trust in the real Rodimus Pri=
me as she remembers what had

opens a com link to Tucson directly.

  > > away from R=
odimus. He's turned evil again. And I don't think

  > =

Tucson gets her call while holding onto Noctorro, flying him back to

 where

them. His
  > > eyes narrow.
  > >

Rodimus has been taken again. 
  > > Straight
  > > Shot is right, he can't=

  > > my
  > > right of min=
d.. Not good, not good at all."
  > >

arefully tending to his comrade.
  >

  > >

  =

  >
  > OOC: Keep in mind that while Noctorro about 5=
-6' tall as oppose to
  > Tuscon's 10' but he is still a significant weight=
 to carry. Tuscon can
  > carry him or let him fly on his own, but caring f=
or him as in trying
  > to bind his injuries or something is not possible w=
hile in flight.
  >
  > > " Leo Prime, I am flying Noctorro back to the dam=
aged Fuzors and I will
  > > stand guard with them until help arrives. In t=
he mean time, Rodimus has
  > > fallen back into evil hands and I think it'=
s best if he is barred from
  > > leadership duties until further notice. I=
 don't like being this harsh, 
  > > but
  > > right now he can't be truste=
d. Tell Bump to secure Nightlight in the 
  > > med
  > > bay and put the A=
rk in immediate lockdown. We can't afford to take any
  > > chances."
  >
 =
 > <NEW =E2=80=93 LEO>
  >
  > "Understood." Was LEO PRIME's response. Evid=
ently there was more he
  > wanted to say, but he was unable to say it at t=
he moment, perhaps
  > because NIGHTLIGHT was still close by.
  >
  > > <OL=
D =E2=80=93 NIGHTSHIFT>
  > >
  > > Nightshift continues to keep his doors =
locked and engine in drive for 
  > > quick
  > > escape if need be. He was=
n't about to let Dark Rodimus get to Elita.

  > > anything he kne=
w that returning her to the Ark would also put his other

risk. That too was out of the question.

k, you ain't puttn one mean aft hand on anyone if

  > > can help i=

  > >=
 your hands on her! Hold on tight kid, I think we're in for a little 
  > >=

ed to My daddy!!!???"said Elita almost sobbing

ARK RODIMUS>

ween DARK RODIMUS and ELITA

  > him is well aware of the fact that there ar=
e few faster than he across
  > the open ground, except perhaps BLURR.

=
  > "I read you." SCOURGE sent back to HYDRAS. "We have Dark Rodimus about
=

  > Night=
shift. They should be coming back towards you." There was a pause
  > befor=
e SCOURGE asked the real and important question, "Where is
  > Cyclonus, wa=
sn't he with Rodimus?"
  >
  > Meanwhile HYDRAS also got a call back from C=
RYOTEK, "What do you mean
  > working with the Maximals? What's going on?"
=
  >
  > OOC: I will be moving Tuscon and whomever is with him to a new thre=
ad
  > soon as they have seperated from the main group.
